seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience (4-5 relevant) with complex data engineering responsibilities including Azure Databricks, Spark, and both batch/real-time processing indicates senior level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with core responsibilities in data gathering, storage, processing, and database integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both 'batch and real-time processing' with Azure Databricks and PySpark, indicating hybrid batch/streaming approach

leadership_expectation.evidence: Collaborative environment mentioned but no direct reports, mentoring, or leadership responsibilities specified - pure IC role
